data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LbDKrGFcoNgQ7kNvgGtouYm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AiTHbjoIQ1DMS7ehRJZvG3T&oh=00_AYAi-22oehPnTIrQZed6Qw96HeKG-QBPRXBI9cA7lR1nxg&oe=668D1D37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=m8vQQfSnpRIQ7kNvgGOFCiF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AiTHbjoIQ1DMS7ehRJZvG3T&oh=00_AYB1eXniBgXDYcPn2cD-CdU9OcOG-c-1Z4xMZRboS-p-uw&oe=668D2AD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xic6Wc-H8NwQ7kNvgECJLxW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AiTHbjoIQ1DMS7ehRJZvG3T&oh=00_AYA1iv00v955rdT6sKjj_DrtWhe_GjQo1tcKG3y7rBXAtA&oe=668D1609)
